title: WEATHER FORECAST FOR 23 JANUARY 2026 Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 23 January 2026 Showers will occur at times in Northern, North-central, Eastern provinces and in Matale and Nuwara-Eliya districts from today evening. A few showers will occur in Uva and Northwestern provinces. Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places elsewhere during evening or night. There is a possibility of ground frost at some places in Nuwara-Eliya district in the early hours of the morning. Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central, North-western, and Uva provinces and in Galle and Matara districts during the early hours of the morning.
